column3: “Really enjoyed this strain. Got a very long bud today and decided to smoke it. First off, this bud was nice and soft to the touch, not wet, but perfectly cure. So many trichomes it shone in the light of my friend's basement. Then there were these beautiful, Blood Orange hairs that covered the bud so perfectly. It was almost as if it were a symmetrical creation. I also noticed on some spots on the bud, were light tint...”

“Planta pequeña, discreta para cultivadores con poco espacio, pero con un olor que atraerá a curiosos indeseados. No fiarse de su tolerancia a plagas, así que tener cuidado con la mal deseada botritis. 
¿Olor? Uff! ¿Sabor? Dulce con toques terrosos ¿Colocón? Difícil de explicar, por una parte, al fumarla con alguien de confianza expande el diálogo y las risas sin dejar de estar con la mente girando, en cambio, al fuma...”
“Good strain to enjoy music with your friends, laughin' on the couch while eatin' as many pizza slices as your stomach can afford”

“A very subtle high which isn't too aggressive, which makes me feel less mongy. Its chilled and giggly. The fact Red Dwarf has a lower THC content is quite nice in contrast to stronger strains. Sometimes a strong cerebral or body high can leave you feeling tired, but this is very manageable, but very nice.”
“Pretty Good, very similar to Bubba Kush; Darker Green with Red Hairs. Lasted about a solid hour give or take.”
“Red dwarf is a Very small plant, no bigger than a toothbrush. Average yield I get 10g. Very tasty and good strain for athletes foot”
“Hard to find but definitely a must. Good for relaxing but not going to sleep right away. I always get it when I can find it. Definitely one of my personal favorites.”
“Perfect strain for first time growers. I harvested 1kg (wet) from 5 plants with a 250W sodium kit. Not so strong high, it allows you to talk, relax and enjoy with friends. We just loved it!!”
“Great medicine for pain and sleeplessness. Very frosty. Reminiscent of northern lights or black domina.”

“The best strain i have ever had for extreme pain relief. I have been a smoker for about 5 years now and I have never found a strain like this! It knocks out the pain and stones you just a bit, it's the perfect strain for chronic pain. Highly recommend”

“My first time trying Red Dwarf, and the smell and taste of it is great. It has that flowery/earthy taste and gives such a mellow high, with a longing after your bed after a couple of hours 
Will definitely be trying this one again! 👍”
“Red dwarf is a Very small plant, no bigger than a toothbrush. Average yield I get 10g. Very tasty and good strain for athletes foot”
“Wery good in taste .  But structure of the buds could be more harder , if you know what i mean ;) Sorry for my eanglish .”
“Was quite enjoyable okay overall but made me feel paranoid as fuck ...”
